sources.title: Ring of Terror
sources.description: Med student Lewis Moffitt (George E. Mather) harbours a secret fear of the dark stemming from a traumatic childhood incident involving a corpse. Nonetheless, he pretends to be unaffected during the first autopsy witnessed by his class, and generally affects an attitude of fearlessness. This, however, inspires his would-be frat brothers to conceive a particularly morbid initiation ritual -- one which will, inevitably, go horribly awry.

sources.title: Ring of Terror
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

metadata.Actors: George E. Mather, Austin Green, Esther Furst
